full_summary:
## Tender Notice
### Title and Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of various valve types (`Globe Valves` and `Diaphragm Stop Valves`) to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

### Item Specifications

The items required include:

* General Supply (GSIN) 4820, National Stock Number (NSN) 21-910-1539, Globe Valves (30 units to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, 60 units to CFB Halifax)
* GSIN 4820, NSN 21-910-9827, Diaphragm Stop Valves (18 units to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, 18 units to CFB Halifax)

### Proposal Requirements

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Additional Information

* Bidders must indicate brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE for equivalent or substitute products.
* Delivery locations are CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
* The procurement method is competitive and open to submission.
* The selection criteria are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* Trade agreements applicable to this procurement include the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Jean-Pierre Normandin at [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca) or (819) 939-3674.

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following URL:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6179/rfp-w8482-241653-a-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6179/rfp-w8482-241653-a-en.pdf)
